text: waldhyn amanuu watabaeathum dhuriyatuhum fi al'iyman, walhqna bihim dhuriyatahum fi mnzlthm fi aljnt, wa'iin lam yablughuu eamal abayhm; ltaqarr 'aeyun alaba' balabna' eindahum fi mnazlhm, fyujmae baynahum ealaa 'ahsan alahwal, wama nqsnahm shyyana min thawab aemalhm. kl 'iinsan mrhwn bemlh, la yuhmal dhanb ghyrh min alnas
